name: py-datasets

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.

dependencies.name: py-aiohttp
dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.

dependencies.name: py-dill
dependencies.description: Serialize all of python

dependencies.name: py-filelock
dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication

dependencies.name: py-fsspec
dependencies.description: A specification for pythonic filesystems.

dependencies.name: py-huggingface-hub
dependencies.description:
This library allows anyone to work with the Hub repositories: you can
clone them, create them and upload your models to them.

dependencies.name: py-importlib-metadata
dependencies.description: Read metadata from Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-multiprocess
dependencies.description: Better multiprocessing and multithreading in Python

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyarrow
dependencies.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the Python bindings.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-responses
dependencies.description: A utility library for mocking out the `requests` Python library.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tqdm
dependencies.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-xxhash
dependencies.description: xxhash is a Python binding for the xxHash library by Yann Collet.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-eval
dependent_to.description:
An automatic evaluator for instruction-following language models. Human-
validated, high-quality, cheap, and fast.

dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-farm
dependent_to.description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.

dependent_to.name: py-continuum
dependent_to.description: A clean and simple data loading library for Continual Learning

dependent_to.name: py-transformer-engine
dependent_to.description:
A library for accelerating Transformer models on NVIDIA GPUs, including
fp8 precision on Hopper GPUs.
